categoryId.label: categoryId
categoryId.notProvided: The categoryId field is required but was not provided.
categoryId.invalidType: The categoryId field does not contain valid data. This field must be a numeric value.

name.label: name
name.notProvided: The name field is required but was not provided.
name.invalidType: The name field does not contain valid data. This field must be a string value.
name.invalidLength: The name field is too long. This field must be no more than 50 bytes long.

deleted.label: deleted
deleted.notProvided: The deleted field is required but was not provided.
deleted.invalidType: The deleted field does not contain valid data. This field must be a boolean value.
